name: Role of the Dice (Unadulterated Chaos, Manumeq, Caravan Frost, GrimmrFade, ryukeyoma, Aytheta, MarianaLopez, NickAnderson, Sasamo)
name_original: Role of the Dice (Unadulterated Chaos, Manumeq, Caravan Frost, GrimmrFade, ryukeyoma, Aytheta, MarianaLopez, NickAnderson, Sasamo)
description:
Role of the Dice is a Turn-Based Strategy game where you fight waves of angry animals. Will you survive or succumb to the role of the dice?

Use the mouse to click pieces and interact with the game. 

For a more in-depth explanation of game controls and tactics, it's highly recommended you check out our handy players' guide! It also gives an authentic board game experience. 

------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

ryukeyoma: Programmer

Aytheta: Artist

SGLilac: Artist

MarianaLopez: Artist

Manumeq: Level Designer

Caravan Frost: Game Designer

NickAnderson: Game Designer

GrimmrFade: Game Designer

Sasamo: UI designer/Artist
